entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE UPPER 50S IN THE AFTERNOON
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY AND BREEZY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
